item.title: CVE-2022-3578|2024-08-03T01:14:02.603Z -- unknown -- profilegrid%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profiles%2C%20memberships%2C%20groups%20and%20communities
item.description: The ProfileGrid WordPress plugin before 5.1.1 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
